dateplot1.title: Temperature, water
dateplot1.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), temperature FROM chiller_stm312_temperature where time between "{from}" and "{to}" and temperature > -9998 order by time

dateplot2.title: Temperature, ambient
dateplot2.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), temperature FROM chiller_stm312_temperature_ambient where time between "{from}" and "{to}" and temperature > -9998 order by time

dateplot3.title: Temperature, setpoint
dateplot3.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), temperature FROM chiller_stm312_temperature_setpoint where time between "{from}" and "{to}" and temperature > -9998 order by time

dateplot4.title: Flow
dateplot4.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), flow FROM chiller_stm312_flow where time between "{from}" and "{to}" and flow > -9998 order by time

dateplot5.title: Pressure
dateplot5.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), pressure FROM chiller_stm312_pressure where time between "{from}" and "{to}" and pressure > -9998 order by time

dateplot1.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), value FROM dateplots_sputterchamber where type = 202 and time between "{from}" and "{to}" and value > -9998 order by time

plot0.label: Thetaprobe Temperature
plot0.old_data_query: select unix_timestamp(time), value from dateplots_thetaprobe where type=(SELECT id FROM dateplots_descriptions where codename="thetaprobe_chiller_temperature") and unix_timestamp(time) > {from}

plot1.label: XRD Temperature
plot1.old_data_query: select unix_timestamp(time), value from dateplots_xrd where type=(SELECT id FROM dateplots_descriptions where codename="xrd_chiller_temperature") and unix_timestamp(time) > {from}
